column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is my favorite tapas place
column2: can't believe I didn't write a review sooner! Everything is great
column3: paella is authentic and filled with meats
column4: goat cheese app is the bomb
column6: bacon wrapped dates are my boyfriend's favorite
column7: and if you sign up for their text and mailing list you sometimes get deals! :) This is pretty much a piece of heaven. Go for girl's night out or on a classy date. Or just because you like good food.
